events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the product was not what I expected and I want to request a refund.
The issue has been classified under Refund based on the customer’s request for money back.
An agent specialized in refund cases has been assigned to handle the request.
Hello! I’m here to assist you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
To process your refund, please share the order number along with the reason for the refund.
My order number is 12345678, and the item was defective and did not match the description on your website.
We apologize for the inconvenience. We can initiate a full refund immediately or arrange a replacement if you prefer.
Thank you for the quick response. Please proceed with the full refund as soon as possible.
Your refund has been processed successfully and should reflect on your original payment method within 5-7 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and if you need any further assistance.
I received the refund today. Thanks for your help and quick service!
The case has been formally closed following successful refund completion and customer confirmation.
We have sent you a short satisfaction survey. We would appreciate your feedback on our support.
